  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL ON IR1 AT IN FULL PPE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER EXAMINED THE HAZMAT, FOLLOWED DECISION TREE, AND PLACED IT INTO A SPILL TRAY BEFORE RETURNING TO HIS CART AND RETURNING TO THE DMP CAGE.
